query.name: findAllByGroupClassStatusIdAndStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM dynamic_event WHERE study_group_class_id=ANY(SELECT study_group_class_id FROM study_group_class WHERE status_id=? AND study_id=?)

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO DYNAMIC_EVENT (STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID, STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID, STUDY_ID, ORDINAL, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, NAME, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE DYNAMIC_EVENT SET STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID=?, STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?, STUDY_ID=?, ORDINAL=?, UPDATE_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=NOW(), NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=? WHERE DYNAMIC_EVENT_ID=?
